post:
<a href="http://hostsailor.com/">HostSailor</a> has established itself as a trusted provider of high quality <a href="http://hostsailor.com/vps-hosting/">VPS Hosting</a>, <a href="http://hostsailor.com/dedicated-servers/">Dedicated servers</a>, <a href="http://hostsailor.com/domain-registration/">Domains</a>, and <a href="http://hostsailor.com/ssl-certificates/">SSL Certificates</a> with top notch support and impeccable reputation and also offers some of the most competitive pricing, without sacrificing on the quality of the products and services. <a href="http://hostsailor.com/">HostSailor</a> is based in Dubai, UAE and the services are physically located in Netherlands, all servers are HP and 100% owned, we do not resell any of our VPS services.

Operating systems: ( CentOS, Debian, Fedora, Scientific, Suse and Ubuntu ) If we don't have it, we can install it for you! or you can request us to mount your own image.


First Month Discount: 40% OFF Using Coupon Code: **50OFFSAILOR**

Discount: First Month 30% OFF Dedicated Using Coupon Code: **30OFFDEDI**

<b>Linux OpenVZ:</b>

<i><u>Mini Sailor:</u></i>

* 256 Guaranteed RAM

* 1 Core

* 1 IPV4 address

* SolusVM Control Panel
* Hosted in Netherlands & Romania

* $0.99 for monthly package

<b>Features:</b>
